duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervising assigned shifts and providing supervision to crew members in the absence of the General Manager.
Completing administrative tasks such as financial and inventory control, schedules, and maintenance logging.
Creating and ensuring exceptional guest experiences.
Ensuring compliance with security, food safety, and cleanliness standards.
Contributing to sales/profit goals by maintaining cost controls.
Building skills and leveraging available tools to prepare for a future General Manager role.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (GED) preferred.
